mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT old_id, sys_user.nick_name, relationship FROM pe_old_family LEFT JOIN sys_user ON pe_old_family.old_id = sys_user.user_id WHERE pe_old_family.family_id = #{userId}
SELECT sys_user.user_id, nick_name FROM sys_user LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ON sys_user.user_id = sys_user_role.user_id WHERE role_id = #{roleId}
